com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class SchedulerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.SchedulerBuilder

  • public class SchedulerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a new DefaultScheduler.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractScheduler build()
      Creates a new Mesos scheduler instance with the provided values or their defaults, or an empty Optional if no Mesos scheduler should be registered for this run.

      (package private) static java.util.Collection<Plan> selectDeployPlan(java.util.Collection<Plan> plans, boolean hasCompletedDeployment)
      Replaces the deploy plan with an update plan, in the case that an update deployment is being performed AND that a custom update plan has been specified.

      Specifies a custom ConfigStore.
      SchedulerBuilder setCustomConfigValidators(java.util.Collection<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> customConfigValidators)
      Specifies a custom list of configuration validators to be run when updating to a new target configuration, or otherwise uses the default validators returned by DefaultConfigValidators.getValidators(SchedulerConfig).

      Specifies custom endpoint resources which should be exposed through the scheduler's API server, in addition to the defaults.

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceSpec

        public ServiceSpec getServiceSpec()
        Returns the ServiceSpec which was provided via the constructor.

      • getSchedulerConfig

        public SchedulerConfig getSchedulerConfig()
        Returns the SchedulerConfig object which was provided via the constructor.

      • setStateStore

        public SchedulerBuilder setStateStore(StateStore stateStore)
        Specifies a custom StateStore. The state store persists copies of task information and task status for all tasks running in the service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the state store is already set, via a previous call to either setStateStore(StateStore) or to getStateStore()

      • getStateStore

        public StateStore getStateStore()
        Returns the StateStore provided via setStateStore(StateStore), or a reasonable default. In order to avoid cohesiveness issues between this setting and the build() step, setStateStore(StateStore) may not be invoked after this has been called.

      • setConfigStore

        public SchedulerBuilder setConfigStore(ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore)
        Specifies a custom ConfigStore. The config store persists a copy of the current configuration ('target' configuration), while also storing historical configurations.

      • getConfigStore

        public ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> getConfigStore()
        Returns the ConfigStore provided via setConfigStore(ConfigStore), or a reasonable default. In order to avoid cohesiveness issues between this setting and the build() step, setConfigStore(ConfigStore) may not be invoked after this has been called.

      • setCustomResources

        public SchedulerBuilder setCustomResources(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> customResources)
        Specifies custom endpoint resources which should be exposed through the scheduler's API server, in addition to the defaults.

      • setCustomConfigValidators

        public SchedulerBuilder setCustomConfigValidators(java.util.Collection<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> customConfigValidators)
        Specifies a custom list of configuration validators to be run when updating to a new target configuration, or otherwise uses the default validators returned by DefaultConfigValidators.getValidators(SchedulerConfig).

      • setEndpointProducer

        public SchedulerBuilder setEndpointProducer(java.lang.String name,
                                            EndpointProducer endpointProducer)
        Specifies a custom EndpointProducer to be added to the /endpoints API. This may be used by services which wish to expose custom endpoint information via that API.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the endpoint to be exposed
        endpointProducer - the producer to be invoked when the provided endpoint name is requested

      • setPlansFrom

        public SchedulerBuilder setPlansFrom(RawServiceSpec rawServiceSpec)
                              throws ConfigStoreException
        Sets the Plans from the provided RawServiceSpec to this instance, using a DefaultPlanGenerator to handle conversion. This is overridden by any plans manually provided by setPlans(Collection).
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException

      • setPlans

        public SchedulerBuilder setPlans(java.util.Collection<Plan> plans)
        Sets the provided Plans to this instance. This may be used when no RawServiceSpec is available, and overrides any calls to setPlansFrom(RawServiceSpec).

      • setRecoveryManagerFactory

        public SchedulerBuilder setRecoveryManagerFactory(RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory recoveryPlanOverriderFactory)
        Assigns a RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory to be used for generating the recovery plan manager.
        Parameters:
        recoveryPlanOverriderFactory - the factory which generates the custom recovery plan manager

      • build

        public AbstractScheduler build()
        Creates a new Mesos scheduler instance with the provided values or their defaults, or an empty Optional if no Mesos scheduler should be registered for this run.
        Returns:
        a new Mesos scheduler instance to be registered, or an empty Optional
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if validating the provided configuration failed

      • updatePodPlacement

        static PodSpec updatePodPlacement(PodSpec podSpec)
        Update pods with appropriate placement constraints to enforce user REGION intent. If a pod's placement rules do not explicitly reference a REGION the assumption should be that the user intends that a pod be restriced to the local REGION.
        Parameters:
        podSpec - The PodSpec whose placement rule will be updated to enforce appropriate region placement.
        Returns:
        The updated PodSpec

      • createConfigStore

        static ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> createConfigStore(ServiceSpec serviceSpec,
                                                  java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<?>> customDeserializationSubtypes,
                                                  Persister persister)
                                           throws ConfigStoreException
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException

      • selectDeployPlan

        static java.util.Collection<Plan> selectDeployPlan(java.util.Collection<Plan> plans,
                                                   boolean hasCompletedDeployment)
        Replaces the deploy plan with an update plan, in the case that an update deployment is being performed AND that a custom update plan has been specified.
